overview.zh: Arcadia (ADIA) is a digital currency and network encompassing a community creating value together with decentralization at its core. Arcadia is very scarce and intended to be held as an asset much like silver or gold. ADIA has a smaller unit (PAW) which has it’s own family friendly meme community. ADIA is fully distributed making it deflationary. Settlements are near instant and fee-less.
